com.ibm.team.workitem.client

Interface IWorkItemClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IWorkItemCommon

    public interface IWorkItemClient
extends IWorkItemCommon
    Client specific part of the work item library providing access to work item specific artifacts. Can be obtained from ITeamRepository.getClientLibrary(Class) as a client library.
    Since:
    0.5
    See Also:
    IWorkItemCommon

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.ibm.team.workitem.common.IWorkItemCommon

        IWorkItemCommon.ITimeCode

    • Method Detail

      • getWorkItemWorkingCopyManager

        IWorkItemWorkingCopyManager getWorkItemWorkingCopyManager()
        The shared work item working copy manager. This manager allows to change the working copies it is connected to.
        Returns:
        the working copy manager
        See Also:
        createWorkingCopyManager(String, boolean)

      • createWorkingCopyManager

        IWorkItemWorkingCopyManager createWorkingCopyManager(java.lang.String owner,
                                                   boolean writeable)
        Creates a new working copy manager which must explicitly be disposed. A working copy manager created for writing to working copies will prevent the working copies it is connected to from being updated with new states from the repository automatically, except for some kinds of remote changes which will always be merged automatically (e.g., additional comments).
        Parameters:
        owner - name identifying the creator/owner of the manager
        true - iff working copies will also be written to
        See Also:
        getWorkItemWorkingCopyManager()

        com.ibm.team.repository.common.transport.TeamContent getImageContent(java.net.URI uri,
                                                                   boolean decorated,

                                                                     throws TeamRepositoryException
        Parameters:
        decorated - setting to true will allow the returned image to be decorated depending on the provided URI. The IImageContentService allows to either dim the icon or overlay the image on a specific position with another image. Refer to IImageContentService for more details on the supported decorations.
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException
        Since:
        3.0

        Parameters:

        Parameters:
        listener - the listener

      • deleteWorkItem

        IDetailedStatus deleteWorkItem(IWorkItemHandle workItem,
                             org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                               throws TeamRepositoryException
        Deletes given work item from the repository and tries to remove links, attachments, change events and fulltext entries in asynchronously running post-deletion cleanup tasks. Attachment are deleted from the repository only if they are not contained by any other work item. Operation does not fail if workItem is null or does not exit.
        Parameters:
        workItem - to delete
        monitor - the progress monitor
        Returns:
        status indicating whether the operation where performed properly. May provide IOperationReport to give for details about problems that occurred, e.g., if authenticated contributor is not authorized to delete work items from the repository.
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException - if the deletion of work item is prevented by general errors

      • deleteWorkItems

        java.util.List<IDetailedStatus> deleteWorkItems(java.util.List<IWorkItemHandle> workItems,
                                              org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                                throws TeamRepositoryException
        Deletes given work items from the repository and tries to remove links, attachments, change events and fulltext entries associated with each work item in asynchronously running post-deletion tasks. Attachments are deleted from the repository only if they are not contained by any other work item. Operation does not fail if workItems is null or any of the items does not exit. Tries to delete as many work items as possible and returns status for each deletion attempt. Does not report status for post-deletion tasks.
        Parameters:
        workItems - to delete
        monitor - the progress monitor
        Returns:
        status indicating whether the operation where performed properly. May provide IOperationReport to give for details about problems that occurred, e.g., if authenticated contributor is not authorized to delete work items from the repository.
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException - if the deletion of work item is prevented entirely

      • getConfigurationUriForWorkItemByLinkType

        java.lang.String getConfigurationUriForWorkItemByLinkType(java.lang.String projectAreaItemId,
                                                        java.lang.String itemId,
                                                        java.lang.String linkTypeId,
                                                        org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                                          throws TeamRepositoryException
        Returns the encoded configuration management URI for the work item based on the currently saved state. The configuration management URI is calculated based on the link type, deliverables associated with the work item, and project area configuration data.
        Parameters:
        projectAreaId -
        workItemId -
        linkTypeId -
        Returns:
        The encoded configuration management URI for the work item. Null for cases where the configuration management URI can not be determined.
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException

      • getConfigurationUrisForWorkItemForLinkTypes

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getConfigurationUrisForWorkItemForLinkTypes(java.lang.String projectAreaItemId,
                                                                                           java.lang.String itemId,
                                                                                           java.util.Set<java.lang.String> linkTypeIds,
                                                                                           org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                                                                             throws TeamRepositoryException
        Returns the encoded configuration management URIs for the work item based on the currently saved state. The configuration management URIs are calculated based on the link type, deliverables associated with the work item, and project area configuration data.
        Parameters:
        projectAreaItemId -
        itemId -
        linkTypeIds -
        monitor -
        Returns:
        A map containing the encoded configuration management URIs mapped to the linkTypeId it is associated with. The map is never null, but the configuration management URIs may be null if the value cannot be determined.
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException
